info.description: Allows the viewing of the available services , their status and workload profiles,the company's Close Of Business Status , Job time progress and report(Deprecated- A newer version V2.0.2 available)
info.title: Serviceautomation

get.summary: Retrieves a list of all available services in system.(Deprecated- A newer version V2.0.2 available)
get.description: Retrieves a list of all available services in system.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Contains the identifier name of the service that has to be executed.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: Contains the name of the Server on which the service will run.

parameters.name: serverStatus
parameters.description: Status of Server  POSSIBLE VALUES: ACTIVE: To set the server as active INACTIVE: To set the server as inactive

parameters.name: workloadProfileId
parameters.description: The ID of a record that is in a multithreaded process

parameters.name: processStatus
parameters.description: Contains the current process status. Allowed values: - 0: Ready - 1: Running - 2: Completed successfully - 3: On hold or in error

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

serverName.description: Contains the name of the Server on which the service will run.

serverStatus.description: Status of Server  POSSIBLE VALUES: ACTIVE: To set the server as active INACTIVE: To set the server as inactive

workloadProfileId.description: The ID of a record that is in a multithreaded process

jobStatus.description: Contains the current status of the job. POSSIBLE VALUES: 0: Ready 1: Running 2: Completed successfully 3: On hold or in error

verificationJobId.description: Contains the verification job identifier.Typically used to control whether a job is completed before the current jobId is executed.

jobFrequency.description: Contains the frequency on which the job is next processed. POSSIBLE VALUES:- D: Every working day. Dnn: Every nn'th working day. W: Weekly every Friday. - M: Last working day of every month. - Mnn: nn represents the offset added to the first day of every month to arrive at Next Run date. When the resultant date is a holiday, previous Working day is considered.

serviceId.description: Contains the identifier name of the service that has to be executed.

serviceControl.description: The control which user be exercise upon the current service.   POSSIBLE VALUES: START: to start the current service.  STOP: to stop the current service AUTO: to start the current service automatically and stop at the end of the process.

processStatus.description: Contains the current process status. Allowed values: - 0: Ready - 1: Running - 2: Completed successfully - 3: On hold or in error

jobLastStartedAt.description: Contains the time on which the service was started.

jobLastStoppedAt.description: Contains the time on which the service was stopped.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

serviceId.description: Contains the identifier name of the service that has to be executed.

serverName.description: Contains the name of the Server on which the service will run.

agentStatus.description: Contains the status of the agent. Possible values: - RUNNING - STOPPED

portId.description: Contains the port on which agent is running

sessionNo.description: Contains the session number in which the agent is running

lastContactTime.description: Contains the Last contact time of running agent.

agentsRequired.description: Contains the number of agents required

workLoadProfileTime.description: The time a multithreaded process takes.

workloadProfileId.description: The ID of a record that is in a multithreaded process

cobDate.description: The time and date on which the error occurred. The information in this field will hold the machine date and time, not the system date.

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

detailKey.description: Contains the keys to the records that were saved at the time the error was reported.

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'

errorMessage.description: Contains the description of the error.

applicationId.description: Contains the application id of the service that has crashed due to error.

isFixRequired.description: Indicates if error is considered to be a critical error or not. For Critical Error, the batch control application will not be able to be invoked until this error has been resolved. For a Non Critical Error, the batch control application may be invoked even when this error is unresolved, by overriding it.  Allowed values: - YES: Critical Error - NO: Non Critical Error

dateResolved.description: Contains the date on which error has been resolved.

controlList.description: Contains the service control list of values to process

processedJob.description: Contains the total number of records/contracts that were processed

completed.description: Contains the number of contracts completed processing.

serviceId.description: Contains the identifier name of the service that has to be executed.

startTime.description: Contains the time job was started

endTime.description: Contains the time the job  ended.

throughPut.description: Contains the number of records processed per minute. Calculated as: keys processed / elapsed time * 60

lastTime.description: Contains the time taken to complete the job.

batchDate.description: The bank date on which the particular report was generated.

sessionNo.description: Contains the session number in which the agent is running

startTime.description: Contains the time job was started

endTime.description: Contains the time the job  ended.

elapsedTime.description: Contains the elapsed time of the report in seconds

processReport.description: Key to the Report Times, containing Process Name and Report Type name
